document.full_text: schawk inc , a provider of digital imaging graphic services, said it may face u.s. securities and exchange commission civil charges relating to a 2008 restatement, and its shares fell as much as 8.9 percent.
document.title: schawk gets wells notice from sec; shares fall
lines_and_colors: schawk inc , a provider of digital imaging graphic services, said it may face u.s. securities and exchange commission civil charges relating to a 2008 restatement, and its shares fell as much as 8.9 percent.
